title: Content Management System
subTitle: April 2012 - January 2014
role: Designed and developed a CMS that we use across Teletoon, Teletoon Retro, Cartoon Network and Adult Swim.

details.description: Our CMS was designed with one over-arching thought in mind - that its data will always live in three places: the database, in a form and on a published page. Everything else is subject to change as our needs require. The CMS manages the following:
items: content groups: abstract data to which a game and TV show must belong. We create our own groups as needed
game content (swf, Shockwave, Unity) that can exist in a number of different template types. Across our four sites, we have roughly 800 game records under management

TV show content: easily the most disparate type of content across our TV properties. Teletoon's TV show pages, for example, can be published according to three different template types; Cartoon Network shows, on the other hand, are more like microsites
video: we tap directly into the Brightcove API to allow our content people to create video records, upload the videos and manage their own playlists
